name: Transmute Potion to Poison
book: Advanced Player's Guide. Copyright 2010, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text:
This extract causes you to take on a pale, sickly pallor for 1 round. During this time, if you consume a potion, it has no effect. Instead, your mouth fills with a vile poison that you can spit onto a weapon as a free action. If you do not spit out the poison in 1 round, it affects you instead. The effect of the poison depends on the level of spell contained in the potion consumed (see sidebar). If the poison is not used within 1 minute per caster level it becomes inert. You can only create one dose of poison in this way per casting of this spell.

Transmuted Poisons

0-Level Potion Poison

Type poison, injury; Save Fortitude DC 10; Frequency 1/round for 2 rounds; Effect 1 Dex damage; Cure 1 save

1st-Level Potion Poison

Type poison, injury; Save Fortitude DC 11; Frequency 1/round for 4 rounds; Effect 1d2 Dex damage; Cure 1 save

2nd-Level Potion Poison

Type poison, injury; Save Fortitude DC 13; Frequency 1/round for 6 rounds; Effect 1d4 Str damage; Cure 1 save

3rd-Level Potion Poison

Type poison, injury; Save Fortitude DC 14; Frequency 1/round for 6 rounds; Effect 1d4 Con damage; Cure 2 consecutive saves
text_zh:
这种化合炼成会使你的脸色在1轮内变为病态般黯淡的苍白色。如果你在持续时间之内消费药剂的话，不会获得任何效果。取而代之的是你的口腔内充满了剧毒，并可以以自由动作将其喷到一件武器之上。如果你在1轮内不吐出毒液的话，它会对你生效。毒液的效果取决于你所消费的药剂中所包含的法术的等级 (见下文)。如果这些毒液没有在每施法者等级1分钟内被使用的话，它将会失效。每次使用这个化合炼成你只能以此方式创造一剂毒液。

转化后的毒素

下列毒素是通过化药为毒创造的。毒素的效果取决于所转化的药剂中包含的法术的等级。 －0级药毒 毒素类型：伤口；强韧豁免DC：10；发作频率：1次/轮 持续2轮；效果：敏捷伤害1点；治愈：1次豁免 －1级药毒 毒素类型：伤口：强韧豁免DC：11；发作频率：1次/轮 持续4轮；效果：敏捷伤害1d2点；治愈：1次豁免 －2级药毒 毒素类型：伤口：强韧豁免DC：13；发作频率：1次/轮 持续6轮；效果：力量伤害1d4点；治愈：1次豁免 －3级药毒 毒素类型：伤口：强韧豁免DC：14；发作频率：1次/轮 持续6轮；效果：体质伤害1d4点；治愈：2次豁免
